Reviews.Title: Clear picture, not happy with the IR
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Clear picture, much clearer than the non-hd Foscams I own.  Has not had any problems connecting to it over wifi (unlike Foscam).  Great low light performance.  My only issue is that when the IR lights kick on, everything gets cloudy which I assume is the lights reflecting back off the inside of the dome cover. Due to this I can not watch the raccooons rummaging through my garbage cans looking for dinner at night.  I am going to take it apart and see if there is a fix but it makes night vision almost useless.  It

Reviews.Title: Impossible to mount on a ceiling. Cables stick out
Reviews.Author: AMEX
Reviews.Content: Camera can not be mounted on a ceiling. Holes do no go through. Cables stick out in the back, so it makes it impossible to have a good installation. I returned it as fast as I unboxed it.

Reviews.Title: They put the I in camera.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am sure this is a great buy for IPhone users.  I did not realize (dumb me) that this camera was optimized for IPhone. I sent it back without any problems.

1/4" 1.3 Megapixel Progressive Scan CMOS

Motion Detection, Email Alert, FTP Upload
H.264/MJPEG/JPEG&dual-stream; encoding
Max. resolution is 720P, support two way intercom, build in MIC
Build in WIFI module, support 802.11b/g/n, easy for connecting wireless router
IR-CUT, 6mm lens
Support network and mobile remotely monitoring
Support Plug&Play;
ProductInfo.Name: iSmart New Wireless WiFi HD IR Dome IP Smartphone CCTV Security Camera with NightVision
